idea-plugin.name: IvyDependencyImportor
idea-plugin.description: Import all the libs which described in the ivy.xml will be imported to the current module library. If you have any suggestion, please mail to me.

  • This is the final version of 2.x. A complete new version will be developed later. Welcome to visit the page:http://code.google.com/p/ivydependencyimportor and give us any suggestion.
